attributes.action: Save energy and public money by not replacing the lights on the Westway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the high winds brought down some lamp posts on the Westway [the elevated section of the A40 in west London] all the lamposts were removed for safety reasons. 

As there is no complicated junction on this bit of dual carriage way and I doubt if there has been any increase in accidents as it is limited to 50mph the DoT could save a lot of money and disruption and also contribute to the country's carbon saving target by not replacing them.
